title: Classic Caesar Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, mash together garlic and anchovy fillets using a fork.
Whisk in egg yolks, Dijon mustard, and lemon juice.
Slowly drizzle in the vegetable oil while whisking constantly, until the dressing is thick and emulsified.
Stir in Parmesan cheese, and season the dressing with salt and pepper to taste.
Add chopped Romaine lettuce and croutons to the bowl. Toss until well coated with the dressing.
